# [[running dog]], [[lackey]]
#: '''1968''', [[:Mao Zedong|Mao Zedong]], ''Chairman Mao's "The Movement of World Revolution"'' (毛主席论世界革命), [http://books.google.com/books?id=Rh5mAAAAIAAJ&q=%22%E8%BF%99%E4%BA%9B%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E8%B5%B7%E6%9D%A5%E5%8F%8D%E5%AF%B9%E7%BE%8E%E5%B8%9D%E5%9B%BD%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E7%9A%84%E5%92%8C%E5%85%B6%E5%AE%83%E5%B8%9D%E5%9B%BD%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E7%9A%84%22&dq=%22%E8%BF%99%E4%BA%9B%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E8%B5%B7%E6%9D%A5%E5%8F%8D%E5%AF%B9%E7%BE%8E%E5%B8%9D%E5%9B%BD%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E7%9A%84%E5%92%8C%E5%85%B6%E5%AE%83%E5%B8%9D%E5%9B%BD%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E7%9A%84%22&hl=en&ei=JpoTTZ7gBcKB8ga42PjzDQ&sa=X&oi=book_result&ct=result&resnum=3&ved=0CCsQ6AEwAg]:
:: 这些国家的人民起来反对美帝国主义的和其它帝国主义的'''走狗'''，也就是反对帝国主义的反动统治。 (People opposed to the reactionary rule of imperialism in these countries are rising up against U.S. imperialism and other '''running dogs''' of imperialism.)
